articles.title: Judge dismisses Justin Baldoni's $400m countersuit against Blake Lively

articles.description: The future for EVs will inevitably involve China. But where does that leave the UK and Europe markets – and what of the questions around national security?
articles.title: China's electric cars are cheaper, but is there a deeper cost?

articles.description: The funk music icon died following a "prolonged battle" with COPD and other underlying health issues, his family said.
articles.title: Sly Stone, leader of Sly and the Family Stone, dead aged 82

articles.title: Billy Boston to become first ever rugby league knight

articles.title: Winter fuel payment: Three-quarters of pensioners eligible after U-turn
